name: Tempo Run (Abis)
description:
A 2D Side scrolling Platformer game developed for a Game Jam, you must reach the end of the level without hitting a single note (obstacle).

Made by:

Pinlunix (UI Designer)

HiccupHan (UI Designer)

minhtendo (Artist)

Gaelle (Developer)

TheOneAbis (Developer) (Me)

ImperialZebra (Composer)
